title: Research a B2B Target Audience
description: A strategist needs to understand the key pain points of a B2B target audience (e.g., VPs of HR).

tasks.description: Use LinkedIn Sales Navigator or a similar tool to identify the demographics and firmographics of the target role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers data on company size, industry, and seniority of the target audience.

tasks.description: Search for industry reports, articles, and forum discussions where this audience discusses their professional challenges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds common themes like 'employee retention', 'recruitment costs', and 'compliance'.

tasks.description: Create a summary of the top 3-5 pain points to inform marketing messaging.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise list of challenges that the product can solve.
